casebody.data:
Karen CARTER, Appellant,
v.
The STATE of Nevada, DIVISION OF WELFARE AND SUPPORTIVE SERVICES OF the DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES; and Steve H. Fisher, in his capacity as Administrator of the Nevada Division of Welfare and Supportive Services, Respondents. No. 70233 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JULY 26, 2018

AFFIRMED.
